title.narrative: Supporting a diverse and sustainable fruit industry in Tonga

description.narrative: Establishing a diverse but sustainable domestic fruit industry in Tonga is critical in terms of supporting the Tongan Government’s efforts to address the non-communicable disease crisis, improve food security capacity and build greater economic resilience in the agricultural sector through product diversification. In 2006, following a direct request from the Tongan Government for assistance, ACIAR commissioned two projects (HORT/2006/108, PC (HORT) /2006/173) to scope opportunities to expand domestic fruit production and resolve key supply chain impediments. This SRA project will add value to this collective investment by addressing key knowledge gaps and ensure the commercial viability of key recommendations provided by PC/2012/049.
